title: Large-scale New Nurses’ Organizational Adaptation and High-quality Nursing Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing theory and practical training experience
context.additional_context: Educational program focused on learning based on real clinical cases occurring in hospital organizational settings and peer collaboration

learning_goals: Graduate nursing learners can demonstrate ≥85/100 on OSCE criteria by adhering to ≥8 of 10 patient safety protocols (medication administration, infection control, vital sign monitoring) at 90% accuracy under simulated conditions (5 patients per nurse, 70% equipment availability) over six months.
Learners systematically analyze clinical experiences to enhance judgment and response capabilities in complex nursing situations.
Learners develop strategies to simultaneously achieve time efficiency and patient safety by collaborating effectively with peers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
